com.outbrain.aletheia

Class DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.outbrain.aletheia.DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    TDomainClass - The type of datum for which a DatumConsumerStream is to be built.

    public class DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass>
extends Object
    Provides a fluent API for building a DatumConsumerStream.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Class<TDomainClass> domainClass
      A special case AletheiaMetricFactoryProvider used only when reporting metrics from a breadcrumb dedicated DatumProducer, that is, a DatumProducer whose only purpose in life is to produce breadcrumbs (breadcrumb is itself, a special kind of datum).

    • Field Detail

      • domainClass

        protected final Class<TDomainClass> domainClass
        A special case AletheiaMetricFactoryProvider used only when reporting metrics from a breadcrumb dedicated DatumProducer, that is, a DatumProducer whose only purpose in life is to produce breadcrumbs (breadcrumb is itself, a special kind of datum).

    • Method Detail

      • This

        protected DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass> This()

      • consumeDataFrom

        public DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass> consumeDataFrom(ConsumptionEndPoint consumptionEndPoint,
                                                                 DatumSerDe<TDomainClass> datumSerDe)
        Adds a consumption endpoint to consume data from, using the specified DatumSerDe instance.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPoint - the consumption endpoint to add.
        datumSerDe - the DatumSerDe instance to use to serialize data.
        Returns:
        a DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder instance configured with the specified consumption endpoint and serialization method.

      • consumeDataFrom

        public DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder<TDomainClass> consumeDataFrom(ConsumptionEndPoint consumptionEndPoint,
                                                                 DatumSerDe<TDomainClass> datumSerDe,
                                                                 com.google.common.base.Predicate<TDomainClass> datumFilter)
        Adds a consumption endpoint to consume data from, using the specified DatumSerDe and filter instances.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPoint - the consumption endpoint to add.
        datumSerDe - the DatumSerDe instance to use to serialize data.
        datumFilter - a filter to apply before delivering data.
        Returns:
        a DatumConsumerStreamsBuilder instance configured with the specified consumption endpoint, serialization method and filter.

        public <TProductionEndPoint extends ProductionEndPoint,UProductionEndPoint extends TProductionEndPoint> TBuilder registerProductionEndPointType(Class<TProductionEndPoint> endPointType,
                                                                                                                                                DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory<? super UProductionEndPoint> datumEnvelopeSenderFactory)
        Registers a ProductionEndPoint type. After the registration, data can be produced to an instance of this endpoint type.
        Parameters:
        endPointType - the type of the custom endpoint to register.
        datumEnvelopeSenderFactory - a DatumEnvelopeSenderFactory capable of building NamedSender's from the specified endpoint type.
        Returns:
        A TBuilder instance with the custom production endpoint registered.

      • registerConsumptionEndPointType

        public <TConsumptionEndPoint extends ConsumptionEndPoint,UConsumptionEndPoint extends TConsumptionEndPoint> TBuilder registerConsumptionEndPointType(Class<TConsumptionEndPoint> consumptionEndPointType,
                                                                                                                                                     DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory<? super UConsumptionEndPoint> datumEnvelopeFetcherFactory)
        Registers a ConsumptionEndPoint type. After the registration, data can be consumed from an instance of this endpoint type.
        Parameters:
        consumptionEndPointType - the consumption endpoint to add.
        datumEnvelopeFetcherFactory - a DatumEnvelopeFetcherFactory capable of building DatumEnvelopeFetchers from the specified endpoint type.
        Returns:
        a TBuilder instance capable of consuming data from the specified consumption endpoint type.
